name: Throw A Fit!
description:
The goal of the game is to throw your opponents off the building 3 times :) The last player standing is the winner. The game supports the use of a keyboard and basic controllers. Max 4 players.

Controls (Keyboard / General Gamepad):

Move -> WASD / Left Stick

Jump -> Spacebar / Button South

Crouch -> Left Control / Left Shoulder

Pick up / Drop object -> E / Right Shoulder

Throw object -> F / Right Trigger

Punch -> J / Button West

Kick -> K / Button East
